howToUse.title: New to Kiwiz?
howToUse.description: Learn step-by-step how to create coloring pages and tracing worksheets effortlessly â€” perfect for parents, teachers, or therapists.

step1.title: Choose Your Adventure
step1.description: Pick if you want a coloring page or a tracing worksheet for your child.

step2.title: Dream Up Anything!
step2.description: Type what you want to create (e.g., "a happy unicorn in space") or use our fun suggestions.

step3.title: Print & Play Instantly!
step3.description: Your unique creation appears instantly, ready to be downloaded and printed.

testimonials.title: What Happy Parents Say!
testimonials.testimonial1: My 4-year-old is obsessed! Kiwiz creates exactly what she asks for. It's been a lifesaver for rainy days and keeps her engaged for hours!
testimonials.author1: Sarah M., Mom of a budding artist
testimonials.testimonial2: My son's handwriting improved dramatically using the tracing worksheets! He actually enjoys learning now because he can trace his favorite characters.
testimonials.author2: Michael R., Dad of a diligent learner

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.solution1: Please wait up to 30 seconds. If it takes longer, try refreshing the page.
troubleshooting.solution2: Make sure you're logged in and have remaining generations for the day.
troubleshooting.solution3: Try generating again with a more detailed prompt.

q1.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q1.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards via Stripe's secure payment system.

q2.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q2.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time, and your plan will remain active until the end of the billing cycle.

q3.question: Do you offer refunds?
q3.answer: We do not offer partial refunds, but you can cancel before your next billing period.

q4.question: Is my payment information secure?
q4.answer: Absolutely. All transactions are processed securely through Stripe. We never store your card details.

howToUse.title: How to Use Kiwiz
howToUse.subtitle: Learn how to create amazing coloring pages and tracing worksheets for your children.

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.description: Follow these simple steps to get started.

step1.title: Choose Coloring Mode
step1.description: Tap the 'Coloring' button to create coloring pages
step1.details: Select from suggested prompts or type your own idea

step2.title: Choose Tracing Mode
step2.description: Tap the 'Tracing' button to create tracing worksheets
step2.details: Practice letters, numbers, and words with guided tracing

step3.title: Generate Content
step3.description: Enter a prompt or click a suggested prompt
step3.details: Our AI will create a custom coloring page or tracing worksheet

step4.title: Download & Print
step4.description: Download your creation or print it directly
step4.details: Sign in to access unlimited downloads and saves

suggestedPrompts.title: Suggested Prompts
suggestedPrompts.description: Use our curated prompts for instant inspiration

customPrompts.title: Custom Prompts
customPrompts.description: Type your own ideas for personalized content

ageAppropriate.title: Age-Appropriate Content
ageAppropriate.description: All content is designed for children aged 2-8

notGenerating.question: Content not generating?
notGenerating.answer: Check your internet connection or try simpler prompts.

cannotDownload.question: Can't download or print?
cannotDownload.answer: Sign in to your account for unlimited downloads. Free users have limited daily access.

notAppropriate.question: Content not appropriate?
notAppropriate.answer: All designs are made for ages 2â€“8. Please report any issue to our support team.

aboutUs.title: About Kiwiz
aboutUs.subtitle: Empowering parents and educators with AI-powered tools to nurture children's creativity and learning.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: At Kiwiz, we believe that every child deserves access to high-quality, personalized educational content. Our mission is to make learning fun, engaging, and accessible for children aged 2â€“8 through innovative AI-powered coloring pages and tracing worksheets.
mission.paragraph2: We're committed to supporting parents and educators in fostering creativity, fine motor skills, and a love for learning through technology that puts children first.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do

childCentered.title: Child-Centered
childCentered.description: Every feature is designed with children's development and safety in mind

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We use cutting-edge AI to create personalized educational content

safetyFirst.title: Safety First
safetyFirst.description: All content is age-appropriate and safe for children aged 2-8

familyFocused.title: Family Focused
familyFocused.description: We believe in bringing families together through creative learning

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Kiwiz was born from a simple observation: parents and teachers spent hours searching for the right content for their children. Existing solutions were too generic, not age-appropriate, or expensive.
ourStory.paragraph2: Our founder, a former kindergarten teacher, saw the need for a tool that could instantly generate personalized educational content based on each child's interests and learning level.
ourStory.paragraph3: Today, Kiwiz serves thousands of families worldwide â€” helping children develop creativity, fine motor skills, and confidence through fun AI-powered activities.
